api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Cancel a payment using your own reference

header.description: A unique identifier for the message with a maximum of 64 characters (we recommend a UUID).

functionality: Cancels the authorisation on a payment that has not yet been [captured](https://docs.adyen.com/api-explorer/#/CheckoutService/latest/post/payments/{paymentPspReference}/captures), and returns a unique reference for this request.

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Update the amount of an authorised payment

header.description: A unique identifier for the message with a maximum of 64 characters (we recommend a UUID).

functionality: Increases or decreases the authorised payment amount and returns a unique reference for this request. You get the outcome of

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Cancel payment using a PSP reference

header.description: A unique identifier for the message with a maximum of 64 characters (we recommend a UUID).

functionality: Cancels the authorisation on a payment that has not yet been [captured](https://docs.adyen.com/api-explorer/#/CheckoutService/latest/post/payments/paymentPspReference/captures), and returns a unique reference for this request.

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Capture an authorised payment

header.description: A unique identifier for the message with a maximum of 64 characters (we recommend a UUID).

functionality: Captures an authorised payment and returns a unique reference for this request. You get the outcome of the request

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Refund a payment

header.description: A unique identifier for the message with a maximum of 64 characters (we recommend a UUID).

functionality: Refunds a payment that has been [captured](https://docs.adyen.com/api-explorer/#/CheckoutService/latest/post/payments/{paymentPspReference}/captures), and returns a unique reference for this request. You get the outcome of

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Reverse (cancel or refund) a payment

header.description: A unique identifier for the message with a maximum of 64 characters (we recommend a UUID).

functionality: [Refunds](https://docs.adyen.com/api-explorer/#/CheckoutService/latest/post/payments/{paymentPspReference}/refunds) a payment if it has already been captured, and [cancels](https://docs.adyen.com/api-explorer/#/CheckoutService/latest/post/payments/{paymentPspReference}/cancels) a payment if it has not yet been captured.

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Create an order

header.description: A unique identifier for the message with a maximum of 64 characters (we recommend a UUID).

functionality: Creates an order to be used for partial payments. Make a POST `/orders` call before making a `/payments` call when

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Cancel an order

header.description: A unique identifier for the message with a maximum of 64 characters (we recommend a UUID).

functionality: Cancels an order. Cancellation of an order results in an automatic rollback of all payments made in the order, either

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Get gift card balance specifying amount of 10 EUR

header.description: A unique identifier for the message with a maximum of 64 characters (we recommend a UUID).

functionality: Retrieves the balance remaining on a shopper's gift card. To check a gift card's balance, make a POST `/paymentMethods/balance` call

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Get gift card balance specifying amount of 100 EUR

header.description: A unique identifier for the message with a maximum of 64 characters (we recommend a UUID).

functionality: Retrieves the balance remaining on a shopper's gift card. To check a gift card's balance, make a POST `/paymentMethods/balance` call

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Get payment session for Apple Pay

header.description: A unique identifier for the message with a maximum of 64 characters (we recommend a UUID).

functionality: You need to use this endpoint if you have an API-only integration with Apple Pay which uses Adyen's Apple Pay

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Get origin keys

header.description: A unique identifier for the message with a maximum of 64 characters (we recommend a UUID).

functionality: This operation takes the origin domains and returns a JSON object containing the corresponding origin keys for the domains.

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Get tokens for stored payment details
functionality: Lists the tokens for stored payment details for the shopper identified in the path, if there are any available. The

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Delete a token for stored payment details
functionality: Deletes the token identified in the path. The token can no longer be used with payment requests.

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Start a donation transaction

header.description: A unique identifier for the message with a maximum of 64 characters (we recommend a UUID).

functionality: Takes in the donation token generated by the `/payments` request and uses it to make the donation for the donation

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Start a donation transaction with a token

header.description: A unique identifier for the message with a maximum of 64 characters (we recommend a UUID).

functionality: Takes in the donation token generated by the `/payments` request and uses it to make the donation for the donation

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Make a card payment with 3D Secure redirect authentication

header.description: A unique identifier for the message with a maximum of 64 characters (we recommend a UUID).

body.raw:
{
  "amount" : {
    "currency" : "USD",
    "value" : 1000
  },
  "reference" : "Your order number",
  "paymentMethod" : {
    "type" : "scheme",
    "number" : "4212345678901237",
    "expiryMonth" : "03",
    "expiryYear" : "2030",
    "holderName" : "John Smith",
    "cvc" : "737"
  },
  "browserInfo" : {
    "userAgent" : "Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9) Gecko/2008052912 Firefox/3.0",
    "acceptHeader" : "text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8",
    "javaEnabled" : true,
    "colorDepth" : 10,
    "screenHeight" : 2000,
    "screenWidth" : 3000,
    "timeZoneOffset" : 5,
    "language" : "en"
  },
  "returnUrl" : "https://your-company.com/...",
  "merchantAccount" : "{{YOUR_MERCHANT_ACCOUNT}}"
}

functionality: Sends payment parameters (like amount, country, and currency) together with other required input details collected from the shopper. To know

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Get the result of a payment session

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Create a payment link

header.description: A unique identifier for the message with a maximum of 64 characters (we recommend a UUID).

body.raw:
{
  "reference" : "{{$guid}}",
  "amount" : {
    "value" : 1250,
    "currency" : "BRL"
  },
  "countryCode" : "BR",
  "merchantAccount" : "{{YOUR_MERCHANT_ACCOUNT}}",
  "shopperReference" : "YOUR_SHOPPER_REFERENCE",
  "shopperEmail" : "test@email.com",
  "shopperLocale" : "pt-BR",
  "billingAddress" : {
    "street" : "Roque Petroni Jr",
    "postalCode" : "59000060",
    "city" : "São Paulo",
    "houseNumberOrName" : "999",
    "country" : "BR",
    "stateOrProvince" : "SP"
  },
  "deliveryAddress" : {
    "street" : "Roque Petroni Jr",
    "postalCode" : "59000060",
    "city" : "São Paulo",
    "houseNumberOrName" : "999",
    "country" : "BR",
    "stateOrProvince" : "SP"
  }
}

functionality: Creates a payment link to our hosted payment form where shoppers can pay. The list of payment methods presented to

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Get a payment link
functionality: Retrieves the payment link details using the payment link `id`.

api_name: Adyen Checkout API (v71): Update the status of a payment link
functionality: Updates the status of a payment link. Use this endpoint to [force the expiry of a payment link](https://docs.adyen.com/online-payments/pay-by-link#update-payment-link-status).
